home.title: Hey! I'm Jeohvanny
home.description: Computer Systems Engineer. Specialized in Software Engineering.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello!, my name is Jeohvanny Sanchez but my friends call me Yova, I am a proactive Computer Systems Engineer with experience in Developer. I stand out for my ability to work in a team, adapt to change, continuous improvement and deliver efficient solutions. My professional goal is to contribute to the development of high quality software.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Brief description of each expert skill like HTML, JavaScript, and React, and intermediate skills in CSS, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Git, and GitHub. Additionally, I have intermediate skills in Java, SQL, MongoDB, and Jest.
skills.html5: I have extensive knowledge in using the latest features and best practices to create semantic and accessible structures in web pages.
skills.css3: Although I am not an expert, I have solid skills to style and design web pages, including creating responsive and attractive designs.
skills.javascript: I excel in the language and its advanced features, I can solve complex problems and develop interactive and dynamic web applications.
skills.typescript: I have fundamental knowledge and can write TypeScript code to improve the quality and security of my JavaScript applications.
skills.react: I have a solid understanding of creating modern and scalable user interfaces using reusable components.
skills.nextjs: Although I'm not a specialist, I have a solid understanding of this powerful React library for creating high-performance web applications.
skills.electron: My experience includes the development of applications implementing advanced features such as inter-process communication and database integration.
skills.nodejs: Although I'm not an expert, I can develop server applications using frameworks like Express, and manage packages with yarn and npm.
skills.db: I have solid experience in designing and implementing relational and NoSQL database systems using SQL and MongoDB.
skills.java: I have worked on projects using Java, my experience has allowed me to acquire a solid knowledge of syntax and best practices in OOP.
skills.git: I have experience in version control and collaborative work on software development projects.
skills.github: Effective collaboration and project management, I can use GitHub effectively to share and collaborate on software development projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.second-project-desc: Point of sale and payment control system Tel-Pos.
projects.third-project-desc: Universal login for point of sale systems.
projects.fourth-project-desc: Point of sale and reservation system for the Yolo-Style business.

contact.title: Contact
contact.info-desc: Do you need a software developer for your team? Let's talk about how I can add value to your project!

footer.description: Computer Systems Engineer. Specialized in Software Engineering.
